easy.question: 뜻에 맞게 작성해보세요.
easy.answer: Please take me to the market.

easy.question: 뜻에 맞게 작성해보세요.
easy.answer: When did you live in Korea?

normal.question: 뜻에 맞게 작성해보세요.
normal.answer: They were at the train station.

hard.question: 뜻에 맞게 작성해보세요.
hard.hint: I ______ a cell phone case ___ Charles.
hard.sentence: 나는 Charles를 위해 핸드폰 케이스를 샀어.
hard.answer: I bought a cell phone case for Charles.
